title: 253 Koro Kawuono, Ruodhwa Man E Polo

lines: 1. Koro kawuono, Ruodhwa man e polo,oseyawo buge bura;Onono paro, weche, timbe,Kata richo, kata ber.
Wanachung` nade ndalono?Wanachung` nade ndalono?Nonwang`wa ka pod waricho,Koso kawaler kuom remb Yesu?
2. Tich yandi ochaki kuom jo monindo;To ndalo koro chiegini,Ma enononwa, jo mangima;To buchwa nobed nade?
3. Kitap Nyasachwa nonyis weche duto;E ma Jang`ad bura nosom;Kaka nong`ad bura e saano,Nosiki ma nyaka chieng`.
